details.title: Haar wavelet and its application in optimal control of linear time-invariant systems
details.abstract: This paper uses Haar wavelet integral operational matrices to approximate the solution of the optimal control problem with quadratic performance measures. The method reduces the original problem to the solution of linear algebraic equations Hence, the computational difficulties are considerably reduced. Since Haar wavelet bases cooperate time frequency localization, the system solution includes both frequency information and time information. Other orthogonal functions do not have this property. An example shows that the result are very accurate.
